desc_content.paragraph: Make a Volume representation compatible with a target version.
Include all volumes matching the filters into a cluster.
When partial_rename is set we will not set the cluster_name with cluster parameter value directly, weâ€™ll replace provided cluster_name or host filter value with cluster instead.

This is useful when we want to replace just the cluster name but leave the backend and pool information as it is. If we are using cluster_name to filter, weâ€™ll use that same DB field to replace the cluster value and leave the rest as it is. Likewise if we use the host to filter.
Returns the number of volumes that have been changed.
